Params: {1: 'A long, long time ago, or in the distant future...?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory745.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Anyway, in an ancient forest, lived a tiny wolf pup.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory745.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Born with a distinct smell and fur of a different color, she was the runt abandoned by her pack. She longed to grow strong and be accepted by others.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory745.jpg', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: 'Heard of a treasure at the edge of the forest that would give power and a race that accepted outsiders, she headed into the depths of the forest...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory747.jpg', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: 'What awaited her there... was not a race welcoming her with open arms. It was monsters with petrifying shapes.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3601_13.jpg', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: 'The wolf pup fought with all her strength but still ended up collapsing from fatigue by the swamp deep inside the forest.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory746.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'She was gravely wounded, and could only stare at the stars in the night sky as she felt warmth gradually fading from her body.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory746.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "...Is this where the wolf pup's journey would end?", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory746.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Right at that moment, the pup noticed a spaceship next to the swamp. She clambered into the ship and pressed some buttons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The green button cured her wounds. The blue button gave her new powers...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Wait, wait, wait. A spaceship? Do you even know where this is going...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '"A good story should catch the reader off-guard." I learned this at WGAA. You really know nothing, do you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'You were the one who asked for feedback. Anyway, go on. What happens next?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'No. 21 lowers her head and pokes at her terminal to turn the page.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'And then the wolf pup pressed the red button.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The vessel shot off into space and the pup fainted from the extreme acceleration.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'When she woke up, she found herself on an unfamiliar purple planet, with countless monsters gathered around it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh! Time for a fight? This is getting interesting. How about we let Noctis enter in a glorious flash and beat those... Hey! Get your claws off me! Off!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Anyway, from here, the wolf pup begins her journey to find the treasure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '...What do you think?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What do you mean what... We didn't even get any action! And it's over?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "You're just too dumb to appreciate it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Am not! Even a dumbass will tell you how absurd the plot is... Vera, what say you?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "It's a little lame...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: '...I will try harder next time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey! What's up with the change in attitude?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Come up with something worthwhile if you're gonna do it. You think I've got time to play these games with you?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "I went out of my way to borrow this from WGAA only because you said you wanted to write a fairy tale. I didn't know you'd need a commandant clearance to get it. How annoying.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'So you gave her this? What exactly is this thing, though?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Captain gave this to me to support my creativity.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 proudly shows off the square device in her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'This "Creative Device" will visually project any story input... or something like that. WGAA had something similar, right? This is just a prototype.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "That sounds useful, but this... thing that she wrote doesn't even make any sense. Can it actually be visualized...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "But I guess we have no choice. If we let this go on, she'll go through our entire paper reserve.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis holds up a stack of crumbled pages, each ripped and taped back together and covered in tiny scribbles of almost illegible letters and symbols.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hahaha. Even the Autonomous Cleaners thought these were trash.', 4: '1'}
{3: "No. 21 lets out a deep growl and pounces onto Noctis' head, waving her claws."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! Get off me, right now!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This is what you get for putting them into the trash can.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "How would I know these aren't trash?! Do you know how long it took me to piece them all back together? My eyes were this close to popping out!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Serves you right!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tsk, sad to be me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...Fine. I'll let you have one of my electrolyte drinks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Huh? All that back-breaking work for one?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I need at least a week's worth.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Noctis is acting all self-righteous again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "That's what you do!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: '...So that was the fairy tale you wanted to write?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera completely ignores their squabbles and looks at No. 21's terminal with crossed arms."}
{3: 'No. 21 takes out her terminal that\'s showing the words "No. 21\'s Creative Portfolio".'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The Gray Raven Commandant helped me with inspiration. It was very helpful.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I saw... lots of ideas all in different colors.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory529.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Creative Painter in Pink', 3: "Writing a story... If I were you, I'd start by thinking about the message I want to get across. What I want to show or tell the reader, that is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Creative Painter in Pink', 3: 'But you can also keep it simple. Creativity should be free. Just create the colors you like with your writing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Creative Painter in Pink', 3: "If you don't know where to start, try building your story upon something you saw or from your own experience.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory175.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force in a Hurry', 3: 'What kind of stories do I like? What a weird question. Do I look like I have nothing to do? Gosh...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Engineering Force in a Hurry', 3: "But if you insist... It's got to have calamity followed by a glorious rebirth, unwavering determination, and even better if it's touching... What's that face?! Bianca loves these too!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Polite Strike Hawk', 3: 'Stories like this... are quite rare nowadays. I used to love a story about a tiny protagonist traveling between different planets.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Polite Strike Hawk', 3: "I've sent you the data. I hope it helps.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Control Court Construct', 3: 'Items from Earth have been checked and processed. Please review the item list.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Control Court Construct', 3: 'A bottle of sand, a purple plant sample, "blue glass," "red rock"... and uh... half a piece of cake? Are you going to eat it, or...? A source of inspiration? I don\'t quite get it, but best of luck.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Control Court Construct', 3: '...(Whispering) Why is she making that face?! Am I in trouble?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "...So I know what I'm going to write now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "That was just the beginning. I'm going to bring you up to speed on the rest now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This story is called...', 4: '1'}
